content: this legal case involves a dispute over the division of an inheritance the plaintiff filed a lawsuit in the county court but it was initially dismissed the plaintiff submitted an objection which was rejected they then appealed to the district court which canceled the previous order and took action on the proceedings both parties responded to the lawsuit and the plaintiff requested an expert examination the court prepared for the examination and resolved the request the court then gave orders to both parties to fulfill tasks in the preliminary procedure a deadline for compromise negotiations was set and a compromise was reached the defendant appeared in court for a hearing and the plaintiff requested a substantive review of the matter the court concluded the preliminary proceedings and set a deadline for the defendant to respond with a list of procedural expenses the judgment was publicly announced on december 18 2020 the main circumstances of the claim involve an inheritance both parties are joint owners of a property the property was previously owned equally by the parents of the parties after the death of one parent the defendant inherited a share of the property and the plaintiff inherited a share as well the plaintiff also acquired an additional share through a gift transaction the plaintiff has been trying to reach an agreement with the defendant to sell the property but the defendant has been unresponsive the plaintiff wants to terminate the joint ownership and become the sole owner by compensating the defendant the court has determined the ownership shares and has ordered the plaintiff to pay compensation to the defendant the court has also determined the procedural costs which the defendant is responsible for the court has awarded the plaintiff a total of 279240 euros in favor of their case
